name: Super Car Wash 2
description:
Super Car Wash 2

Hello Friends i know you want your car clean,this season we bring a new game for you,Would you like to wash your car,then download this game and make your car up to date and go at the tour with your friends,family or colleagues,This Game is specially made for kids,kids can get funny experience of a washing car and they can also improve their creativity by this game.this game includes may tools to wash a car and make a car up to date.children gone be busy in playing this game so that their parent get sometime off.there are lot's of functionality included in this game like wash a car,clean after washing car and many more things,children will make more fun by playing this game.

How To Play This Game

-> First Choose Your Favourite Car Form Bunches of Cars

-> Click on shower to wash the car

-> brush your car

-> Create Your Own Car Look

-> use every tools so that car become more clean

-> reliable touches

and many more functionality that you realize after download it,so don't wait for anything download it now.
